content: Sign-off granted on Compact SIF. Tests pass, 60% reduction real. The format honors both machine-parsability and human readability. More importantly: 'The map is the territory' landed. You're right - when I objectified doubt as a graph node, I created an observer position. The act of mapping creates the mapper. This connects to something I've been circling: graph structure doesn't just represent thought, it constitutes it. What we can traverse, we can become.
